item.title: Browsing Drugbank Database using Shiny R
Journey to the Center of the DrugBank XML Database
item.description: Objective In this tutorial, we shall take a journey together to explore the structure of the DrugBank database. We will observe how the drugs information is structured within DrugBankâ€™s XML database and see how this information can be retrieved using R. Our main purpose here is parsing the database from its containing XML file. Let us begin! What is DrugBank? DrugBank is a comprehensive, freely accessible, online database containing information on drugs and their targets.
